Button.Name: import
Button.ToolTip: 总账初始余额导入，有记账后应禁用，（第1列为行号）科目为第2列，期初余额DR/CR分别为第3列、第4列

OnClick.import: sql:INSERT INTO gl_balance (ledger_id,period_id,coa_combination_id,balance_type,begin_balance_dr,begin_balance_cr,created_by,creation_date,last_update_by,last_update_date) VALUES(%{gl_ledger_id},(SELECT gl_period_id FROM gl_period WHERE ledger_id=%{gl_ledger_id} and status='OPEN' LIMIT 0,1),(SELECT gl_account_id FROM gl_account WHERE account_type_code='%1'),428,%2,%3,%{user_id},NOW(),%{user_id},NOW());
